summary: Successfully tested all new features: table column sorting, PDF export, and Wishlist CRUD with move-to-collection functionality. All backend tests pass (14/14) and frontend UI tests pass.
passed_tests: ✅ Backend: GET /api/wishlist returns list
✅ Backend: POST /api/wishlist creates new item with all fields
✅ Backend: PUT /api/wishlist/{id} updates item
✅ Backend: DELETE /api/wishlist/{id} removes item
✅ Backend: GET /api/wishlist/{id} returns 404 for non-existent
✅ Backend: DELETE /api/wishlist/{id} returns 404 for non-existent
✅ Backend: POST /api/wishlist/{id}/move-to-collection creates locomotive
✅ Backend: POST /api/wishlist/{id}/move-to-collection creates rolling stock for vagon type
✅ Backend: GET /api/export/catalog/pdf returns valid PDF
✅ Backend: GET /api/export/locomotive/{id}/pdf returns valid PDF
✅ Backend: GET /api/export/locomotive/{fake_id}/pdf returns 404
✅ Backend: GET /api/export/rolling-stock/{id}/pdf returns valid PDF
✅ Backend: GET /api/stats includes wishlist stats
✅ Frontend: Dashboard Export Catalog PDF button present and links to correct API
✅ Frontend: Locomotive Detail Export PDF button present and links to correct API
✅ Frontend: Locomotives page sortable headers (brand, reference, dcc_address, price) work
✅ Frontend: Rolling Stock page sortable headers work
✅ Frontend: Wishlist page sortable headers (priority, brand, model, estimated_price) work
✅ Frontend: Sort indicator (chevron) shows on active sort column
✅ Frontend: Wishlist add item form has all fields (tipo, prioridad, marca, modelo, referencia, precio, tienda, url, imagen, notas)
✅ Frontend: Create wishlist item via form works correctly
✅ Frontend: Move to Collection dialog opens with date and price fields
✅ Frontend: Move to Collection creates locomotive and removes wishlist item

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all sorting, PDF export, and wishlist flows working)

seed_data_creation: None - test data created and cleaned up during tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: New features fully tested: 1) SortableHeader component used in Locomotives, Rolling Stock, and Wishlist pages - click header toggles asc/desc with visual indicator. 2) PDF export endpoints return valid PDFs for catalog and individual locomotives/rolling stock. 3) Wishlist CRUD fully working with move-to-collection feature that creates locomotive or rolling stock based on item_type. Test file at /app/backend/tests/test_new_features.py can be used for regression.
